description.full: ASURA'S WRATH, the upcoming interactive cliffhanger-action game, lets you unleash your rage in two epic boss battles!  Experience two of the game's episodes: In Episode 5, face off against the planet-sized Wyzen; and in Episode 11, clash with the powerful sword-wielding Augus on the surface of the moon!  ASURA'S WRATH is a unique blend of action and drama. Immerse yourself in this unprecedented take on the action genre!
description.short: ASURA'S WRATH, the upcoming interactive cliffhanger-action game, lets you unleash your rage in two epic boss battles!
